headTitle: ConstCash â€“ Manage your personal finances

hero.title: App that can help you to manage your personal finances.
hero.description: Organize your finances, create budgets, achieve goals

about.title: Manage budgets.
about.description: ConstCash is a privacy-oriented personal budget management application.
about.privacyDescription: Your data is exclusively yours and no one else has access to it. You can enable backups using iCloud or create a local copy of your data, but you are in control!
about.moreAboutPrivacy: You will find more information in the

accountsAndCategories.title: Accounts & Categories
accountsAndCategories.accountsDescription: Create accounts that keep you informed about the status of your finances in a particular place, such as your wallet, bank account or debts from your friends.
accountsAndCategories.categoriesDescription: Categories help organize your income and expenses. Determine how your monthly finances are shaping up so you can more easily control your household budget.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: Transactions are all the income, expenses or transfers you make. They make it easier to control the flow of your money.

financialGoals.title: Financial goals
financialGoals.description: Add a financial goal to motivate yourself to achieve your chosen goals. Control your own progress easily.

recurringPayments.title: Periodic addition of transactions
recurringPayments.description: Recurring payments allow you to add frequent transactions at equal intervals. Each payment can be repeated weekly, monthly, quarterly or annually.

transactionTemplates.title: Conveniently create repeatable transactions
transactionTemplates.description: Transaction templates are used to quickly add frequent transactions.

budgets.title: Control your spending with budgets
budgets.description: Budgets help you set limits on transactions in a given category, giving you more control over your spending.

multiLanguage.title: Multilingual app
multiLanguage.description: Use the application in your native language

question1.title: How is data privacy ensured?
question1.description: Application data is stored only in the device memory. It is possible to export the data to a file and save it in any place indicated by the user. The application collects only simple analytical and diagnostic data, like error information, device model, system version, etc. We do it only in order to improve application performance. What's more, we take care of the security of access to the application - you can use a pin and authentication with FaceId or TouchID.

question2.title: Do I need to create an account in the app?
question2.description: No, there are no user accounts in the app. All data is kept in the device memory.

question3.title: Is there a fee for the app?
question3.description: The app is free, but a one-time payment (in the amount of $6.99) is required to use all features. Without premium it is not possible to create more than 2 accounts and 2 categories. Once purchased, you will always be able to use all the features of the app.

contact.title: Change you financial habits
contact.description: Download the app and work on your future!
